$PAXG  dropped 9.46% in the last 24 hours, sharply reversing its recent rally despite strong 30-day (+14.2%) and yearly (+76.7%) gains, largely tracking a sudden correction in spot gold after prices pulled back from record highs.   As a 1:1 gold-backed token, $PAXG  #faced immediate selling pressure from profit-taking and arbitrage as physical gold cooled, while broader crypto risk-off sentiment pushed capital toward Bitcoin, lifting BTC dominance and weighing on alternative safe-haven assets.   Technically, price has broken below key short-term moving averages, with momentum turning bearish and the 61.8% Fibonacci level near $4,821 now a critical support to watch. If gold stabilizes around the $5,000/oz region, $PAXG  could consolidateâ€”but if not, could this correction deepen before buyers step back in? ï»¿#Altcoin Season#
